decks.notes: The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly through cards like Utopia Sprawl and Eldrazi Temple to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures such as Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker. The control aspect comes from spells like Malevolent Rumble and Kozilek's Command to disrupt the opponent's strategy, while Ancient Stirrings helps to dig for key pieces. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with large threats while maintaining control over the game with removal spells and disruption.

This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on disruption through Thoughtseize and Static Prison while also pumping out aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury. The deck also has removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Fatal Push to maintain board control. Additionally, the deck includes Goblin Bombardment for additional reach and damage. The mana base is carefully balanced to support the aggressive strategy, with a mix of fetchlands and shocklands. Overall, the deck aims to pressure the opponent quickly and efficiently while disrupting their game plan.

The deck focuses on assembling the combo pieces of Underworld Breach and Grinding Station to loop cards from the graveyard and generate a large amount of mana, untapping artifacts with Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student, and Mox Opal to execute a game-ending Grapeshot or Breeding Pool finish. The deck runs efficient cantrips like Preordain and Mishra's Bauble to find combo pieces quickly and control opponents' resources with Unholy Heat and Malevolent Rumble. The mana base is streamlined with fetchlands to ensure consistency in casting the combo pieces and disrupting opponents' game plans.

This deck focuses on aggressive creatures and burn spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. It utilizes efficient creatures like Guide of Souls and Ranger-Captain of Eos, along with powerful burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Discharge, to deal damage fast. The inclusion of Ajani, Nacatl Pariah adds a powerful finisher to the deck. The deck also includes control elements like Static Prison and Arena of Glory to disrupt the opponent's game plan and protect your own creatures. Overall, the deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain control of the game to secure a victory.

The main idea of this deck is to cycle through your deck quickly and manipulate your opponent's board by playing creatures with Cascade and casting Living End to bring back all of your creatures from the graveyard. The goal is to overwhelm your opponent with a large number of creatures and disrupt their game plan. The deck includes cards that allow you to counter spells, draw cards, and control the board to help you achieve your combo win condition. It combines card advantage, tempo plays, and a powerful combo finish to outmaneuver your opponent.

This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creature plays, utilizing cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls to quickly apply pressure to the opponent. The deck also includes disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push to control the board. Additionally, cards like Goblin Bombardment and Galvanic Discharge provide extra reach and removal options. The mana base consists of a mix of fetch lands and shock lands to ensure consistent mana sources. Overall, the deck aims to swarm the opponent with efficient creatures and burn spells to achieve a quick victory.

This deck focuses on utilizing Yawgmoth, Thran Physician's ability to sacrifice creatures to draw cards and remove threats while also tutoring for key combo pieces using Chord of Calling and Green Sun's Zenith. The deck leverages a toolbox approach with creature options like Orcish Bowmasters, Outland Liberator, and Hapatra, Vizier of Poisons to handle various situations. Grist, the Hunger Tide and Agatha's Soul Cauldron provide additional value and flexibility. The inclusion of cards like Endurance and Wall of Roots helps to disrupt opponents and ramp mana, creating a versatile and synergistic combo strategy.

The deck focuses on aggressive play with a diverse array of creatures and spells that can quickly overwhelm opponents. It utilizes powerful cards such as Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Scion of Draco to apply pressure early on, while Leyline of the Guildpact and Leyline Binding help control the board. Tribal Flames and Territorial Kavu provide additional reach and damage potential. The deck also incorporates a strong mana base with fetch lands and multi-color lands to ensure consistency in casting its spells. The goal is to maintain a fast-paced tempo and secure victory through relentless aggression.

The deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana with land cards and using Indomitable Creativity to cheat out powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty. It utilizes cards like Faithless Looting and Persist to fill up the graveyard with targets for Creativity. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a big creature or multiple threats early in the game, while disrupting their strategy with Thoughtseize and Dismember. The deck also includes elements of card advantage and recursion with Wrenn and Six, making it a versatile and unpredictable combo deck.

The deck focuses on casting cheap spells and maximizing damage output quickly to overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing cards like Arclight Phoenix and Soul-Scar Mage in combination with burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Spike, the deck aims to deal consistent damage and pressure the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Faithless Looting and Light Up the Stage help to maintain card advantage and dig for key pieces of the combo, while cards like Lava Dart and Gut Shot provide additional removal and flexibility in dealing with threats.

This deck focuses on creating a powerful combo using cards like Basking Broodscale and Blade of the Bloodchief to generate a massive amount of tokens and pump them up to overwhelming levels. The deck also includes a variety of support cards like Urza's Saga and Ancient Stirrings to help set up the combo quickly and efficiently. The inclusion of cards like Kozilek's Command and Eldrazi Temple provides additional versatility and power to the deck, making it a formidable force in Modern 1 vs 1 matches.

The main concept of this Modern aggro Merfolk deck is to quickly establish a board presence with powerful Merfolk creatures such as Master of the Pearl Trident, Lord of Atlantis, and Harbinger of the Seas. Using support cards like Aether Vial and Cavern of Souls, the deck aims to disrupt opponents with cards like Tide Shaper and Merfolk Trickster while controlling the game with counterspells like Flare of Denial and Force of Negation. The deck utilizes Mutavault for additional creature versatility and Sink into Stupor for card advantage, ultimately overwhelming the opponent with a swarm of aggressive Merfolk creatures.
